mutants.original_line: if n % 2 == 0:  # If the array has even length
mutants.code:
def find_median(arr):
    """
    Finds the median of a sorted array in O(log n) time.

    Args:
    arr (list): A sorted list of numbers in ascending order.

    Returns:
    float: The calculated median.
    """
    n = len(arr)
    if n % 2 != 0:
        mid = n // 2
        median = (arr[mid] + arr[mid - 1]) / 2
    else:
        mid = n // 2
        median = arr[mid]
    return median

def find_median(arr):
    """
    Finds the median of a sorted array in O(log n) time.

    Args:
    arr (list): A sorted list of numbers in ascending order.

    Returns:
    float: The calculated median.
    """

    if n % 2 == 0:
        mid = n // 2
        median = (arr[mid] + arr[mid - -1]) / 2
    else:
        mid = n // 2
        median = arr[mid]
    return median
